greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 3^n - A006952(n).
formula: a(n) ~ 3^(n/2) / 2 if n is even and a(n) ~ 3^((n+1)/2) / 2 if n is odd.
mathematica: nmax = 60; 3^Range[0, nmax] - CoefficientList[Series[Product[(1 - x^k)/(1 - 3*x^k), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, May 06 2018
